name: The Bodhi Tree Cafe and Bar

reviews.review_text:
This Is A Hidden Gem ðŸ’Ž

What a delightful selection of menu items! I absolutely loved it.

The Schezwan Chicken Lollipops are to die for. They are so crispy and the flavour is top notch. The quantity and size is filling as well

These Cheesy Chicken Momos are beautifully crunchy. The pricing for 8 momos is a steal deal.

I personally don't like banana, but I was bold and ordered the Banana Nutella Pancakes and I was in awe. I can't believe I devoured Bananas Pancakes.

This was truly a delightful dinning experience. I am definitely coming back here to try their other menu options and definitely recommending it to my friends.

The owner and the staff is very well mannered and sweet. There is nice parking opposite the restaurant and a beautiful view of the river. The quantity of food for the price is very reasonable. Thank You.

Food: 10/10
Menu Options: 10/10
Price: 10/10
Service: 10/10
Ambience: 8/10
Parking: 8/10

Good vibes. Happening place with good quantity and quality food. If you are looking for good vibe to have food chitchat then this place is definitely recommend. If you want unique taste then may not be the appropriate option. Taste is normal like other cafes.

I had a wonderful experience at this restaurant! The space is perfectâ€”comfortable for families with children, as they provide high chairs. The food is delicious, and thereâ€™s plenty of room for kids to roam around and explore. Additionally, friendly animals enhance the experience, making it even more enjoyable for the little ones.
